briefdescription.para: This is the list of modules to be used in the HAL driver.

Adjust the value of External High Speed oscillator (HSE) used in your application. This value is used by the RCC HAL module to compute the system frequency (when HSE is used as system clock source, directly or through the PLL).

detaileddescription.para: Value of the External oscillator in Hz

briefdescription.para: In the following line adjust the External High Speed oscillator (HSE) Startup Timeout value.

detaileddescription.para: Time out for HSE start up, in ms

briefdescription.para: Internal High Speed oscillator (HSI) value. This value is used by the RCC HAL module to compute the system frequency (when HSI is used as system clock source, directly or through the PLL).

detaileddescription.para: Value of the Internal oscillator in Hz

briefdescription.para: In the following line adjust the Internal High Speed oscillator (HSI) Startup Timeout value.

detaileddescription.para: Time out for HSI start up

briefdescription.para: Internal High Speed oscillator for ADC (HSI14) value.

detaileddescription.para: Value of the Internal High Speed oscillator for ADC in Hz. The real value may vary depending on the variations in voltage and temperature.

briefdescription.para: Internal High Speed oscillator for USB (HSI48) value.

detaileddescription.para: Value of the Internal High Speed oscillator for USB in Hz. The real value may vary depending on the variations in voltage and temperature.
< Value of the Internal Low Speed oscillator in Hz The real value may vary depending on the variations in voltage and temperature. Value of the External Low Speed oscillator in Hz

briefdescription.para: Time out for LSE start up value in ms.

detaileddescription.para: Time out for LSE start up, in ms

briefdescription.para: This is the HAL system configuration section.
Uncomment the line below to expanse the "assert_param" macro in the HAL drivers code.
